name: Frying Frenzy
description:
welcome to frying frenzy

your goal is to hit the egg with a frying pan to prevent it from hitting the ground for as long as possible

the egg will evolve as  time goes on and will start duplicating

you can also evolve to make it easier to hit the egg by purchasing upgrades in the shop

press space to swing the pan and press "z" or click the shop button to open the shop

all of the background music was written by me
listen to it here: https://www.youtube.com/@ontiul/featured | https://soundcloud.com/ontiul

the game gets a bit glitchy when you progress too far

im a lil disappointed cuz i put a ton of work into this and it ended up being kind of a buggy glitchy mess but its still pretty cool

also i usually pay more attention to making pixel art consistent and all that but cuz the time limit an stuff it was hard ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
